abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Songo-Songo Petroleum
            Exploration Project is intended to finance the second phase
            of a drilling program designed to assist the Borrower in the
            assessment of the hydrocarbon potential of the Songo-Songo
            field. Specifically the credit will finance: (a) drilling of
            three offshore wells at Songo-Songo, including completion
            for production, if justified; and (b) strengthening
            TPDC's capacity to implement the project through the
            provision of technical assistance and training of its staff.
